column3:
“Warning: Very Potent 

I was hesitant on buying this Strain because of the price, but a deal happened, and jumped at it.

I'm a Sativa guy and nit picky about a lot of strains.......but......Holy Shit! 

Very potent, hits fast and very easy on the lungs (Flower) during inhale/exhale. Not much of a aftertaste.

Method:Bong 2ft (2 hits) 
Starts off very focused and and uplifting with insane focus. Probably the best I'v...”
“Holy shit”

“Variedad Sativa fácil de cultivar en indoor, muy buena estructura y floración rápida para una sativa, efecto fuertemente eufórico, risas y al final una relación de relax sin llegar al sueño. De mis sativas favoritas.”

“Very complex taste. Fruity, flowery, herbal.
High potency. Gets me zoned in and focused. Energetic, and sharp.
Leaves an amazing fragrance in the room.”

“wait a sec, are sure this isn't Maui waui! stuff burns and taste hella close to Maui. the high comes on easy and definitely makes talking and hanging smooth. the fruit smell makes it good for a relaxing day and or a day out.ha”
“Good clean head high. Smells and tastes great too. Perfect cerebral state of mind. (y)”
“very smooth strong high, taste of lavender and fruit. very unique strain”
“Great strain! Potent but subtle. You don't realize the high until you start giggling. OK. Now...Feel the mellow, happy, contented aura surrounding you? Ahhh!”
“Great strain! Potent but subtle. You don't realize the high until you start giggling. OK. Now...Feel the mellow, happy, contented aura surrounding you? Ahhh!”
“its a good even head and body high good for stress a very nice high”

“For me, the best results came from hitting this flower out of a bong. I ground up just enough for a nice bowl, and sprinkled the kief right on top of the bowl. The effects were almost immediate, and lasted a little for a good while. It made me super focused and driven. I wanted to keep moving and doing tasks. I was pretty much oblivious to everything around.”

“Wow the herbal musky taste and the smell similar to incense I spot on. Definite uplifting sativa effects. A little short lasting but overall a pretty decent strain. The biggest reason to try this strain would be the aroma/taste, not the high.”

“Wow! this is a REALLY great strain and super potent.

Really nice pine/sage and hits nice.... Easy on the lungs, taking 2 ft bong hits".

column1: Starts with a lot of energy and creeps into a very stoney head high with total relaxation but still enough to be up in at em.
Joint pain turns to warm tingles.

column2: and and you will either be focused on one thing or zone....

column3: “it makes me so high i luvvvvvvv it!”
“Beautiful”
“I have a half ounce of this. it's not the best for pain.4/5 percent good though!”
“Tried the wax...68% thca, 15% thc...WHAT?! Crazy! All head high...no body buzz at all.”

“Love this. It helps with my MS muscle spasms and my nerve pain from Trigeminal Neuralgia. It definitely gives me a boost of energy.  I use a Kandy Pen for my dry herb so I don’t think I get the actual aroma or true taste of it all.”

“Hands down this is the best Sativa I’ve ever tried. Of course it’ll vary betwixt users, but this one is best for me. I would recommend this to anyone. It instantly washes away stress and anxiety which lead to a lot of conversation. If ya know me, I’m the quiet type so a lengthy conversation rarely involves me, unless it’s Cannabis, music, art, or  Cannabis...😏”
“nice taste”
“I don't like the flavuor”

“One of my favorites. We start with a strong head high, winding down to an energetic euphoria...great for getting things done! I've had flower in this strain but of lately been dabbing live sugar..great taste for a concentrate.”
“The best one I tried so far!”
“aka Sueno”
“Nice strain whit intense high and nice flavour. Awesome weed!”
“Very good head high!”
“Lives up to it's rep. Definate quality stuff. Good feel good effects.”
“this strain is pretty good if you want a good buzz.. helps me with my pain and stress. puts me in a better mood”
“excellent strain very strong, lots of red hairs ,big plants in or outdoor but I've had a quarter pound off one indoor”
“this is fuel! I have so much energy! love it!”
“the strain is good”
“sabor muy húmedo a tierra la verdad me encantó la pude probar en Castelldefels Barcelona”
“I think this is great great for my speech and functionality”
“Great Sativa. Would definitely have again, given the chance. Very crystalized.”
“Weed was good. Especially the indica strains. Nice high”
“Man all I can say it's a great stained to bad Philly don't have it........”
“Nice”
